item.title: DAF NTT by XBS v1.5.8 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 1, 2025

DAF NTT by XBS v1.5.8 ETS2

Changes 1.5.8
– Compatibility for ETS2 1.54
– Updated models and animations
– Reimported materials to latest dates
– Tweaks for interior shadows

Features
– Cabin: Day Cab, Sleeper Cab, Custom Sleeper Cab
– Chassis: NTT 6×4 490, NAT 6×4 536
– Engines: 2826 DKA 1160, 3326 DKX 1160
– Transmissions: ZF 16S-130, ZF 16S-160
– Tuning Parts
– Cabin accessory ready
– Standalone

Credits: XBS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Painted Bumperspoiler For Scania Next Gen S/R v1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 1, 2025

Painted Bumperspoiler For Scania Next Gen S/R v1.54 ETS2

Bumperspoiler With 4 Options:
– Bumperspoiler
– Bumperspoiler With Talmu
– Bumperspoiler With White Hellalamp [Lightmask]
– Bumperspoiler With Orange Hellalamp [Lightmask]

Note: You need to select low bumper first before seeing the options on the lowergrill guard
Mod Support Versions 1.54.x

Credits: Harsha Customs

item.title: Bitrem guerra ALM ETS2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 30, 2025

Bitrem guerra ALM ETS2 v1.0 ETS2

You’re looking for ALM Guerra B-train mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). I found some relevant information:
There are several Guerra B-train mods for ETS2, including variations of covers, accessories, and tarps. Some are compatible with different versions of the game (such as 1.44, 1.49, 1.53, 1.54/1.55).
Some of these mods are paid, while others are free.
Remember to always check the mod’s compatibility with your game version and follow the installation instructions provided by the mod creator.

Credits: ALM

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. item.title: Scania s111 1.54 v2.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 30, 2025

Scania s111 1.54 v2.0 ETS2

You’re looking for a Scania 111S mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) for game version 1.54, specifically version 2 of the mod! This is an excellent choice for a classic Brazilian trucking experience.

The Scania 111S, affectionately known as “Jacaré” (Alligator) in Brazil due to its long nose and distinctive appearance, is an iconic truck. Many Brazilian ETS2 modders create high-quality versions of this truck, often with extensive customization options.

Given that you’re looking for a specific version (v2) and compatibility with ETS2 1.54, here’s what you need to know:

Scania 111S (Jacaré) Mod for ETS2 1.54 v2
The Truck: The Scania 111S mod typically offers a highly detailed replica of the classic truck, including:
Authentic Brazilian Features: Expect a focus on realism for the Brazilian market, with various chassis configurations (e.g., 4×2, 6×2, 6×4), specific accessories like “foguinhos” (small lights), traditional grilles, and various exhaust options.
Detailed Interior: A realistic interior with period-correct dashboards, animated gauges, and customizable interior accessories.
Sound: Many good 111S mods come with custom, high-quality engine sounds that replicate the characteristic Scania L6 or V8 engines of that era.
Skins: A wide variety of paint jobs (skins) from real-life Brazilian transport companies.
Version Compatibility (ETS2 1.54): The key here is the `1.54` in your request. ETS2 updates frequently, and mods need to be updated to remain compatible. A mod specifically listed for “1.54” should work, but older versions might cause crashes or glitches. `v2` likely indicates a refined or updated version of a previous release, often with bug fixes, new features, or improved compatibility.

Installation Tips
Installing ETS2 mods is generally straightforward:
1. Download the Mod: You’ll typically download one or more `.scs` files.
2. Place in Mod Folder: Move the downloaded `.scs` file(s) into your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder. This is usually located at:
`Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`
3. Activate in Game:
Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
On the profile selection screen, click “Mod Manager.”
Find the Scania 111S mod in the list (it might show up as “Scania 111S Jacaré” or similar).
Double-click it or click the arrow to move it to the “Active Mods” column on the right.
Make sure its priority is set correctly (sometimes truck mods need higher priority than other mods like sound packs, but generally, the game handles it well).
Click “Confirm Changes.”
4. Buy the Truck: Load your game profile. You should now be able to purchase the Scania 111S from a Scania Truck Dealer in-game, or sometimes a Mod Dealer if the mod creator set it up that way.

Important Reminders:
Backup your Profile: Before installing any new mods, it’s always a good idea to back up your ETS2 profile (`Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\profiles`). This way, if something goes wrong, you can easily revert.
Read Mod Descriptions: Always read any instructions or requirements provided by the mod creator. They might specify required DLCs, known conflicts with other mods, or specific installation steps.
Antivirus: Be cautious about where you download mods from. Stick to well-known and reputable sources to avoid malware.

Good luck getting your Scania 111S “Jacaré” on the road in ETS2 1.54! Do you have any specific features you’re hoping this mod includes?

Credits: ROTAS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
